name: VENTION VGA to HDMI Adapter, Uni-Directional Gold-Plated VGA(Source) to HDMI(Display) Converter (Male to Female) with 0.5FT Audio Cable from PC, Monitor
short_description: Only from VGA to HDMI, HDMI to VGA will Not Work: VGA to HDMI only converts VGA signal to HDMI signal, unidirectional. VGA cannot be directly connected to the display. Please connect the VGA port to a signal source such as Desktop, TV Box, etc., and connect the HDMI port to a monitor, TV, or projector, etc. Do not connect in the opposite direction

Power Function: With its Micro USB port, this video adapter can be used with various VGA devices such as Ultrabooks, Chromebooks, desktops, Raspberry Pi, Intel NUC, and Blu-ray players. Please note that the USB connector must be plugged in to power the active VGA to HDMI chipset during use

3.5mm Audio Output: This adapter comes with a 0.6m AUX cable for easy transfer of audio through its 3.5mm audio port, providing clear sound. lt's a plug-and-play and doesn't require any drivers. You can connect the VGA plug to various VGA signal output devices such as set-top boxes, and desktop computers.Connect the HDMI interface by plugging in the HDMI cable to HDMI signal input devices such as displays and televisions

Stability Features: This adapter features a built-in AG02/MS9288C digital signal conversion chip, which is more stable than similar chips found in other products. Supports resolutions up to 1920x1080@60Hz (1080p Full HD). It greatly reduces screen flickering and black screens during signal transmission, ensuring uninterrupted work and entertainment

24-Hour Worry-Free After-Sales Service: VENTION specializes in professional audiovisual connections and multimedia conversion products, providing customers with high-quality products and experiences. If you have any issues with this product, the VENTION team offers 24-hour pre-sales and after-sales service

name: HDMI to VGA, Uni-Directional Gold-Plated HDMI to VGA Adapter (Male to Female) for Computer, Desktop, Laptop, PC, Monitor, Projector, HDTV, Chromebook, Raspberry Pi, Roku, Xbox and More - Black
short_description: COMPACT DESIGN: The compact-designed portable Moread HDMI to VGA adapter connects a computer, desktop, laptop, or other devices with HDMI port to a monitor, projector, HDTV, or other devices with VGA port; Tuck this lightweight gadget into your bag or pocket to do a business presentation with your laptop and projector, or extend your desktop screen to a monitor or TV; A VGA cable is required (sold separately)
SUPERIOR STABILITY: Built-in advanced IC chip converts HDMI digital signal to VGA analog signal; It is NOT a bi-directional converter and cannot transmit signals from VGA to HDMI

INCREDIBLE PERFORMANCE: The HDMI male to VGA female converter supports resolutions up to 1920x1080@60Hz (1080p Full HD) including 720p, 1600x1200, 1280x1024 for high definition monitors or projectors; Gold plated HDMI connector resists corrosion and abrasion and improves the signal transmission performance; Molded strain relief increases cable durability

BROAD COMPATIBILITY: The HDMI-VGA adapter is compatible with computer, pc, desktop, laptop, ultrabook, notebook, Chromebook, Raspberry Pi, Intel Nuc, Roku, PS3, Xbox One, Xbox 360, Wii U, Set Top Box, TV BOX, or other devices with HDMI port; *NOT COMPATIBLE* with Blu-ray player and devices with low-power HDMI ports such as PS4, Apple MacBook Pro with Retina Display, Mac mini, and Apple TV
5 Year WARRANTY: Exclusive Moread Unconditional 5-year Warranty ensures long-time satisfaction of your purchase; Friendly and easy-to-reach customer service to solve your problems timely

3 Easy to Use: The HDMI-VGA adapter is easy to use and does not require any additional software or drivers. name: VGA to HDMI Adapter with USB Powered, 1080P VGA Male (Source) to HDMI Female (Display) Cable Converter Connector Compatible with PC Computer Desktop Laptop Monitor HDTV Projector-0.6 Feet
short_description: Uni-Directional VGA to HDMI Adapter: The VGA Male to HDMI Female short adapter is specifically designed to connect VGA devices to HDMI ports. You can connect your laptop, PC, desktop with VGA source to larger screens (such as monitors, televisions and projectors) with HDMI port for video streaming or gaming. (Note: Uni-directional, only from VGA input to HDMI output.)

USB power plug and play: plug and play without installing drivers or software. This VGA to HDMI adapter comes with a USB power port and does not require an external power cord. Insert the USB A connector into a power source (computer or wall charger) for optimal performance and compatibility. (USB is only used to stabilize the voltage of connected devices and does not provide video transmission function).

1080P UHD Resolution：Our VGA to HDMI adapter supports up to 1080P@60Hz and backwards compatibility 720P. More precise visual effects than 1080P, making it an ideal choice for high-intensity gaming and movie immersion.

High Quality Materials: This cable uses oxygen free copper inner conductor, which has stronger conductivity. Multilayer copper shielding minimizes signal loss to the greatest extent possible. The use of 24K gold-plated connectors is more corrosion-resistant. High quality aluminum shells provide better heat dissipation. Durable nylon braided jacket with a bending life exceeding 15,000+, extending service life.

Reliable Service: We hope this product can create a perfect experience for you and offer a one-year warranty for this VGA to HDMI Adapter. If you have any questions about our products, you can contact us at any time, and our professional customer service will reply within 24 hours.
